message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering is truly a game-changer and holds immense value, worth $1,000,000 to you. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate.
Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I see the value in your product, I'm looking to spend closer to $800,000.  Is there any flexibility in your price to make this deal work for both of us?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I am proposing a revised price of $850,000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
